sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: まで marks the end point or limit in space, time, or extent.

children.heading: 1. Time Limit (Until)
children.content: 5時まで - "until 5 o'clock" 明日まで - "until tomorrow" 月曜まで待つ - "wait until Monday"

children.heading: 2. Destination Limit (To/Up to)
children.content: 東京まで - "to/as far as Tokyo" ここまで - "up to here" 駅まで歩く - "walk to the station"

children.heading: 3. Extent/Degree
children.content: ここまで - "to this extent" そこまで - "that much/far"

sections.heading: から + まで
sections.content:
Common combination for range:

9時から5時まで - "from 9 to 5" 月曜から金曜まで - "Monday to Friday" 東京から大阪まで - "Tokyo to Osaka"

sections.heading: まで vs に
sections.content:
に = destination (arrive/be) まで = extent (all the way to) 駅に行く - "go to station" (destination) 駅まで歩く - "walk to station" (extent)

Both can be correct, nuance differs.

sections.heading: までに (By/Before)
sections.content:
までに = deadline (by the time):

まで - "until" (continuous) までに - "by" (deadline) 5時まで働く - "work until 5" (continuous) 5時までに終わる - "finish by 5" (deadline)

sections.heading: Common Patterns
sections.content: [Time]まで 5時まで待つ - "wait until 5" [Place]まで 駅まで歩く - "walk to station" [から]〜まで 9時から5時まで - "from 9 to 5"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ End point/limit ✓ "Until" (time) ✓ "To/up to" (place) ✓ までに for deadlines ✓ Often paired with から

Related:

から (kara) - From に (ni) - Location
